title: Styling Buttons
body: button {   color: white;   background-color: #00B294;   padding: 10px;   margin: 5px 0; }
author: cupcake

title: Styling Id
body: #snippets {   font-size: 28px;   color: white;   background-color: #81E6D3;   padding: 5%;   border-radius: 15px;   width: 80%;   height: auto;   margin-top: 10px; }
author: cupcake

title: Styling Class
body: .login {   font-weight: lighter;   color: 005E50;   background-color: #81E6D3;   padding: 10%;   border-radius: 15px; }
author: cupcake

title: Label an Input
body: <label for="language">Language</label>         <input class='add' id='language' type="text" name="language" value="{{snippet.language}}" placeholder="Language"/>
author: alice

title: How to Require a Model File
notes: In this example the model file is user.js
author: reeses

title: How to Use Body-Parser
notes: A Node.js package using npm install
author: reeses

title: How to Listen for a Port
body: app.listen(3000, function() {     console.log('Your app is running!')   });
author: reeses
